message.content:
1. Type 2 diabetes is one of the most common causes of cardiovascular disease.
2. Type 2 diabetes causes arterial stiffness changes.
3. Arterial stiffness changes are associated with cardiovascular disease.

messages.content:
Statement: Type 2 diabetes is one of the most common causes of cardiovascular disease as it causes arterial stiffness changes.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
